channel.title: The Bridge | Podcast
channel.description: "The Bridge" is a podcast that explores the human experience through the lens of faith and spirituality. It's a journey of self-discovery, where we delve into the complexities of life, love, loss, and the search for meaning. Join us as we navigate the bridges between our inner selves and the world around us, exploring how faith can guide us through life's challenges and inspire us to live a life of purpose and compassion.
channel.author: The Bridge
channel.itunes:author: The Bridge

It's a journey of self-discovery, where we delve into the complexities of life, love, loss, and the search for meaning. Join us as we navigate the bridges between our inner selves and the world around us, exploring how faith can guide us through life's challenges and inspire us to live a life of purpose and compassion.

item.title: A Mission Of Honour | Ep. 2 – The End from the Beginning
item.description:
🔹 A Mission of Honour

Welcome to the second episode of The End from the Beginning series, titled "A Mission of Honour."

Have you ever been on a mission of honor before? Would you do it all over again? What does it truly mean to live a life of purpose and devotion?

Join us as we uncover the true meaning of mission and honor through biblical wisdom, historical lessons, and modern-day examples. From Nelson Mandela’s unwavering stand for justice to Apostle Paul’s relentless pursuit of God’s mission, we’ll explore what it means to stand for truth, even in the face of opposition.

Through scriptures, real-world insights, and thought-provoking reflections, this episode challenges us to examine our own calling and responsibilities.

Tune in and discover:

What drives us to fulfill a mission? And can we truly impact the world today as the early disciples did?

📅 New Episodes Every Saturday at 7 PM (West African Time)
🎧 Listen on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, iHeart, and Patreon
📲 Follow us on TikTok & Instagram: @thebridgeconnectp
📩 Share your thoughts: thebridgeconnectp@gmail.com

item.title: What Every Man Needs | Ep. 1 – The End from the Beginning
item.description:
🔹What Every Man (and Woman) Truly Needs

Welcome to the very first episode of The End from the Beginning series, titled"What Every Man Needs."

Have you ever wondered what every man—and every woman—truly needs? Do these needs come at a high cost, or is there something deeper that money can’t buy?

Join us as we explore the essentials of life through biblical wisdom, historical lessons, and modern-day examples. We’ll uncover how material pursuits can easily become idols and why true fulfillment can only be found in God.

Through scriptures, real-world insights, and thought-provoking reflections, this episode challenges us to reconsider what we prioritize in life.

Tune in and discover:

What do we really need? And will it break the bank?

📅New Episodes Every Saturday at 7 PM (West African Time)
🎧 Listen onSpotify, Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, iHeart, and Patreon
📲 Follow us on TikTok & Instagram:@thebridgeconnectp
📩 Share your thoughts:thebridgeconnectp@gmail.com

item.title: The Bridge TEASER
item.description:
🌉 “Destiny isn’t found—it’s built.” 🌉
Join Tony Adamu on The Bridge, a podcast for anyone ready to:
➡️ Replace empty rules with lasting purpose.
➡️ Turn questions into clarity.
➡️ Create a life that feels like yours.

✨ Episode 1 drops NEXT SATURDAY, 7 PM WAT!
🔗 Tap the links below to follow, listen, and never miss an episode:

🎧 Spotify: Listen here

▶️ YouTube: Watch here

📻 iHeart: Tune in here

🛒 Amazon: Find here

🍏 Apple Podcast: Listen here

🤝 You can support as well on Patreon: Support here

💬 Got a story or question? Email us: thebridgeconnectp@gmail.com

🔥 Save this post. Tag a friend. Let’s build bridges, not walls.

#createyourdestiny #podcastlaunch #selfdiscovery #discipleship #biblepodcast #christianlife
